TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EncryptedXml extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表實作 XML 加密的處理序模型。

span.span: Represents the process model for implementing XML encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是.NET Framework 中的 XML 加密所使用的主要類別。The class is the main class used for XML encryption in the .NET Framework. XML 加密是標準為基礎、 可互通的方式，來加密所有或部分的 XML 文件或任意資料。XML Encryption is a standards-based, interoperable way to encrypt all or part of an XML document or any arbitrary data. .NET Framework XML 加密類別實作全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 規格，XML 加密位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。The .NET Framework XML encryption classes implement the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification for XML encryption located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. 使用類別，每當您需要共用加密的 XML 資料，應用程式或組織之間以標準方式。Use the class whenever you need to share encrypted XML data between applications or organizations in a standard way. 任何實作 XML 加密的 W3C 規格，來解密加密使用這個類別的任何資料。Any data encrypted using this class can be decrypted by any implementation of the W3C specification for XML encryption. XML 加密會取代任何純文字 XML 項目或文件``元素，其包含已加密 （或加密文字） 的純文字 XML 表示法或任意資料。XML encryption replaces any plain text XML element or document with the `` element, which contains an encrypted (or cipher text) representation of plain text XML or any arbitrary data. ``項目可選擇性地包含有關在哪裡找到索引鍵，將會解密加密文字，以及哪一個密碼編譯演算法用來加密純文字。The `` element can optionally contain information about where to find a key that will decrypt the cipher text, and which cryptographic algorithm was used to encrypt the plain text. ``項目是類似於``樣式和使用方式，但它可以讓您加密會解密值的索引鍵的項目``項目。The `` element is similar to the `` element in style and usage, except that it allows you to encrypt a key that will decrypt the value of the `` element. 請注意，``項目和``元素絕不會包含未加密的金鑰。Note that the `` element and the `` element will never contain an unencrypted key. 您可以使用下列方法之一來交換金鑰資訊：Use one of the following methods to exchange key information: - 不包含任何金鑰資訊。Do not include any key information. 如果您選擇此選項，則這兩個合作對象必須先同意演算法和金鑰，才能交換加密的資料。If you choose this option, both parties must agree on an algorithm and key before they exchange encrypted data. - 統一資源識別元 (URI) 屬性中包含金鑰的位置``項目。Include the location of the key in the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) attribute of the `` element. 這兩個合作對象必須同意事先金鑰的位置，此位置必須保持機密。Both parties must agree on the key location ahead of time and this location must be kept secret. - 包含對應中的索引鍵的字串名稱``項目。Include a string name that maps to a key in the `` element. 這兩個合作對象必須同意的金鑰名稱對應，然後再交換加密的資料，以及此對應必須保持機密。Both parties must agree on the key name mapping before they exchange encrypted data and this mapping must be kept secret. - 包含已加密的金鑰，在``項目。Include an encrypted key in the `` element. 這兩個合作對象必須同意才能交換加密的資料解密的加密的金鑰的金鑰。Both parties must agree on the key that decrypts the encrypted key before they exchange encrypted data. 您可以選擇性地包含名稱或位置將會解密中的索引鍵之索引鍵``項目。You can optionally include a name or location of the key that will decrypt the key in the `` element. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立簡單的公用程式類別，使用演算法來加密 XML 文件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple utility class that uses the algorithm to encrypt an XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密使用對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key. 此範例不包含任何金鑰資訊加密的 XML 文件中。This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密使用對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key. 這個範例會解密方法用來尋找適當的解密金鑰加密 XML 文件中內嵌索引鍵的名稱。This example embeds a key name in the encrypted XML document that the decrypting method uses to find the appropriate decryption key. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將加密的非對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an asymmetric key. 這個範例會建立的對稱工作階段金鑰來加密文件，並再插入 XML 文件中內嵌工作階段金鑰的加密的版本會使用非對稱金鑰。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the asymmetric key to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密 XML 文件使用 X.509 憑證。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an X.509 certificate. 這個範例會建立的對稱工作階段金鑰來加密文件，並再插入 XML 文件中內嵌工作階段金鑰的加密的版本會使用 X.509 憑證。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the X.509 certificate to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會解密所有``初始化期間載入的 XML 文件的項目。The method decrypts all `` elements of the XML document loaded during initialization. 呼叫這個方法之後, 所有``文件中的項目取代成純文字版本。After you call this method, all `` elements in the document are replaced with plain text versions. 方法解密只有最上層``項目。The method decrypts only top-level `` elements. 如果您需要解密的進階加密的文件 （已加密一次以上的文件），您必須呼叫方法重複直到所有``項目已解密。If you need to decrypt a super-encrypted document (a document that is encrypted more than once), you must call the method repeatedly until all the `` elements have been decrypted. > [!NOTE] > 方法解密只有有效的 XML 資料。The method decrypts only valid XML data. 若要解密的任意資料，請使用方法。To decrypt arbitrary data, use the method. 若要使用 XML 加密使用 X.509 憑證，您必須具有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝和 X.509 憑證必須使用增強型提供者。To use XML Encryption with X.509 certificates, you must have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed and the X.509 certificate must use the Enhanced Provider. 如果您沒有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝或 X.509 憑證不會使用增強的提供者，與"Unknown Error"將會擲回時解密 XML 文件。If you do not have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed or the X.509 certificate does not use the Enhanced Provider, a with an "Unknown Error" will be thrown when you decrypt an XML document. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將加密的非對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an asymmetric key. 這個範例會建立的對稱工作階段金鑰來加密文件，並再插入 XML 文件中內嵌工作階段金鑰的加密的版本會使用非對稱金鑰。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the asymmetric key to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密 XML 文件使用 X.509 憑證。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an X.509 certificate. 這個範例會建立的對稱工作階段金鑰來加密文件，並再插入 XML 文件中內嵌工作階段金鑰的加密的版本會使用 X.509 憑證。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the X.509 certificate to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將解密高層級 <`EncryptedData`> 標記包含另一個加密 <`EncryptedData`> 標記。The following code example demonstrates how to decrypt a high level <`EncryptedData`> tag that contains another encrypted <`EncryptedData`> tag. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedDocument.DecryptDocument-SuperEncryption#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedDocument.DecryptDocument-SuperEncryption/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedDocument.DecryptDocument-SuperEncryption#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedDocument.DecryptDocument-SuperEncryption/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是便利的方式來加密使用的憑證項目的外部 XML。The method is a convenient way to encrypt the outer XML of an element using a certificate. 這個方法會產生 256 位元進階加密標準 (AES) 工作階段金鑰加密 XML 項目，然後加密並簽署 AES 金鑰使用物件。This method generates a 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) session key to encrypt an XML element and then encrypts and signs the AES key using the object. 方法接著會傳回所產生的 XML，做為項目。The method then returns the resulting XML as an element. 如果您需要更充分掌控加密，因此您可以將加密的資訊到``項目，或指定的整個 XML 項目或只是它的內容是否應為加密，使用方法多載。If you need more control over the encryption, so you can place the encrypted information into a `` element or specify whether the entire XML element or just its contents should be encrypted, use the method overloads. 若要使用 XML 加密使用 X.509 憑證，您必須具有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝和 X.509 憑證必須使用增強型提供者。To use XML Encryption with X.509 certificates, you must have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed and the X.509 certificate must use the Enhanced Provider. 如果您沒有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝或 X.509 憑證不會使用增強的提供者，與"Unknown Error"將會擲回時解密 XML 文件。If you do not have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed or the X.509 certificate does not use the Enhanced Provider, a with an "Unknown Error" will be thrown when you decrypt an XML document. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密 XML 文件使用 X.509 憑證。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an X.509 certificate. 這個範例會建立的對稱工作階段金鑰來加密文件，並再插入 XML 文件中內嵌工作階段金鑰的加密的版本會使用 X.509 憑證。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the X.509 certificate to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document.
